short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will modify Google Apps URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like to manipulate Google app URL's to meet the needs of your students? 

Well, you are in luck because Sir Links-a-Lot extension has your Back with big round buttons in your face to do all the work for you! 

Templates ~ Force a copy ~ Preview ~ PDF  with just a click check this out!
